name: Shrink.instFinite
initialProofState:
α : Type u
inst✝ : Finite α
⊢ Finite (Shrink.{v, u} α)
decl:
instance Shrink.instFinite {α : Type u} [Finite α] : Finite (Shrink.{v} α) :=
  .of_equiv _ (equivShrink _)

name: Fintype.card_shrink
initialProofState:
α : Type u
inst✝¹ : Fintype α
inst✝ : Fintype (Shrink.{v, u} α)
⊢ Eq (Fintype.card (Shrink.{v, u} α)) (Fintype.card α)
decl:
@[simp] lemma Fintype.card_shrink [Fintype (Shrink.{v} α)] : card (Shrink.{v} α) = card α :=
  card_congr (equivShrink _).symm
